import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' function Register() { const [values, setValues] = useState({ username: '', email: '', password: '', cpassword: '' }) const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost:5050/', values) .then( res => console.log(res)) .then( err => console.log(err)) } return (

Sign-Up

setValues({...values, password:e.target.value})} className='form-control rounded-0' type="password" placeholder='Enter Password' name='password' />
setValues({...values, cpassword:e.target.value})} className='form-control rounded-0' type="password" placeholder='Enter Password' name='password' />
